name: A.R.S.
description:
Arcade racing game with little touches of simulation.
Retro style, and configurable arcade machine.
World Championship and Endless mode.
Various Game Center leaderboards.
Game Center: 29 scoreboards for the total time of each race and another 29 for the fastest lap of each race. In addition, 4 trophies when you finish the championship.

100% indie and made by a person.

Please download and publishes a review for support.
Thank you so much.

ArkaGames.es
